name: Paranormal State: Poison Spring - A Hidden Object Adventure
name_original: Paranormal State: Poison Spring - A Hidden Object Adventure
description:
The official adventure game based on the hit A&E TV series Paranormal State!

Team up with famous ghost hunters and investigate a terrifying supernatural event at Poison Spring State Park, site of a grisly Civil War battle.

Search for clues to the cause of the strange occurrences. But be careful: someone is hiding a dark secret. Unravel a centuries old tale of war, lost love, and paranormal adventure!

Features:

• Become a member of the ghost hunting team!
• Explore the hauntingly beautiful Poison Spring park!
• Use real life ghost-hunting tech, such as the EMF Meter, the Thermal Cam, and EVP Recorder!
• Full voice-acted cutscenes and a story inspired by the hit TV series
• Lots of engaging mini-games and Hidden Object scenes
• Stunning graphics enhanced for retina display
• Special Collector's Edition available with even more locations, scenes and puzzles!
